languages.text: {n}Маражай стряхивает кровь с клинков и поворачивается к вам. В его глазах все еще пылает раж битвы. Спустя мгновение губы друкари расползаются в ухмылке.{/n} "Надо же. Как переменчива судьба, Вольный Торговец".

{n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай стряхивает кровь с клинков и поворачивается к вам. В его глазах все еще пылает раж битвы. Спустя мгновение губы друкари расползаются в ухмылке.{/n} "Надо же. Как переменчива судьба, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you. Hatred burns in his eyes — but whether it is directed at you or the fallen enemies, you cannot tell. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickleness of fate, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}L'ardeur du combat brûle toujours dans les yeux de Marazhai lorsqu'il se tourne vers vous en secouant ses lames ensanglantées. Un sourire amer naît sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Eh bien... Le destin ne cessera jamais de m'étonner, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai secoue sa lame ensanglantée et se tourne vers vous. Son regard brûle de haine. Mais vous ne parvenez pas à déterminer si elle est dirigée contre vous ou contre vos adversaires tombés au combat. Un sourire amer naît sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Eh bien... Le destin ne cessera jamais de m'étonner, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋甩掉了刀刃上的鲜血，转向你，眼中依然燃烧着战斗的烈焰。过了一会儿，他的嘴角露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}“呵，看啊，命运的安排还真是让人惊讶不已，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋甩掉了刀刃上的鲜血，转向你。他眼中燃烧着炽热的仇恨，但你不知道他的恨意针对的是你，还是倒在地上的敌人。过了一会儿，他的嘴角露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}“呵，看啊，命运的安排还真是让人惊讶不已，行商浪人。”
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは刃についた血を振り落とし、あなたに向き直った。その目には戦いの激しい怒りがまだ燃えている。しかしそれがあなたに向けられているのか、倒れた敵に向けられているのかは、あなたにはわからない。しばらくして彼の唇から笑みをこぼれた。{/n}「さてと。運命の気まぐれには驚くしかないな自由開拓者よ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは刃についた血を振り落とし、あなたに向き直った。その目には戦いの激しい怒りがまだ燃えている。しかしそれがあなたに向けられているのか、倒れた敵に向けられているのかは、あなたにはわからない。しばらくして彼の唇から笑みをこぼれた。{/n}「さてと。運命の気まぐれには驚くしかないな自由開拓者よ」
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schüttelt das Blut von seinen Klingen ab und wendet sich dir zu. Noch immer funkelt der Zorn der Schlacht in seinen Augen. Einen Moment später verzieht er die Lippen zu einem Lächeln.{/n} "Hmm. Man kann die ständig wechselnden Wendungen des Schicksals nur bestaunen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schüttelt das Blut von seinen Klingen ab und wendet sich dir zu. Seine Augen glühen vor Hass. Dir wird aber nicht ganz klar, ob er dir oder den gefallenen Feinden gilt. Kurz darauf verziehen sich seine Lippen zu einem Lächeln.{/n} "Hmm. Man kann die ständig wechselnden Wendungen des Schicksals nur bestaunen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sacude sus armas para limpiar la sangre y se vuelve hacia ti, con la furia de la batalla aún reluciente en su mirada. Un momento más tarde, sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa.{/n} «Vaya, vaya. Los giros caprichosos del destino nunca dejan de sorprenderme, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai agita las espadas para sacudirles la sangre y se vuelve hacia ti. Sus ojos echan chispas, pero no sabes si la causa eres tú o los enemigos caídos. Un instante después, sus labios se contraen en una sonrisa.{/n} «Vaya, vaya. Hay que ver cómo son los caprichos del destino, ¿verdad, Comerciante Independiente?».
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Kılıçlarındaki kanı silkeleyerek temizleyen Marazhai, savaşın hiddetinin hüküm sürmeye devam ettiği gözlerini sana çeviriyor. Hemen ardından dudakları kıvrılarak bir gülümseme meydana getiriyor.{/n} "Ya... İnsanın elinden, kaderin kaypak cilvesine hayran olmaktan başka bir şey gelmiyor Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai shakes the blood off his blades and turns to you, battle fury still blazing in his eyes. A moment later, his lips twist into a smile.{/n} "Well, now. One can only marvel at the fickle turns of fate, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kılıçlarındaki kanı silkeleyerek temizleyen Marazhai, savaşın hiddetinin hüküm sürmeye devam ettiği gözlerini sana çeviriyor. Hemen ardından dudakları kıvrılarak bir gülümseme meydana getiriyor.{/n} "Ya... İnsanın elinden, kaderin kaypak cilvesine hayran olmaktan başka bir şey gelmiyor Hür Tacir."
traits.speaker: CommoraghArenaMarazhai
